structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 512, sec. 14, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 207, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990; and ch. 455, sec. 35, effective July 13, 1990; and ch. 474, sec. 10, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 72, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988; and ch. 347, sec. 3, effective April 10, 1988; and ch. 365, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 336, sec. 7, effective July 1, 1986. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 299, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 26, sec. 3, effective March 3, 1978.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Delineation of offenses for which fines may and may not be prepaid.
